uk.thecodingbadgers.minekart.race

Class Race

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.thecodingbadgers.minekart.race.Race
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RaceSinglePlayer, RaceTeam

    public abstract class Race
extends Object
    Author:
    TheCodingBadgers The interface for races.
